primaryPackages.lineItem: A-Camera: 6x Arri Alexa 65/SXT Packages (Full Spectrum Lenses)
primaryPackages.description: Primary camera packages for principal photography. 32-week rental to cover prep, shoot, and wrap.

specialtyRigs.description: Includes 2x IMAX camera packages, 4x Phantom High-Speed, 8x Underwater Housings, Motion Control Rigs (45 days), Technocrane (85 days), and custom fabrication for Panther Suit, Rhino, and Vibranium Mine rigs.

accessories.description: Comprehensive package including specialty lenses, 30+ production monitors, robust wireless video transmission systems, and DIT stations with 4K workflow.

expendables.description: Includes camera tape, lens cleaning supplies, batteries, and media storage consumables for an 85-day shoot.

studioPackage.description: Major tentpole package for 50 studio days. Includes extensive array of 18K/12K/6K HMIs, full SkyPanel & LiteMat LED systems, and advanced DMX control consoles.

specialtyLighting.description: Purchase and custom development of advanced LED systems, high-power holographic projectors, and proprietary rigs for Vibranium and kinetic energy effects.

generators.description: Fleet of silenced generators (2x 2000amp, 4x 1200amp) with complete international power distribution, cabling, and voltage conversion systems for all locations.

rigging.description: All necessary truss, motors, stands, and rigging for studio grid and complex location setups. Includes weather protection for international shoots.

expendables.description: Includes gels, diffusion, replacement bulbs, and generator fuel for all shooting days.

dollies.description: 4x Chapman/Leonard Super PeeWee IV dolly packages with track for the full 32-week production period.

cranes.description: Rental of Strada and Giraffe cranes for location work. (Technocrane costed under Camera).

rigging.description: Extensive rigging for car chases (15 vehicles), stunts, practical set pieces, and aerial work. Includes camera car systems and process trailers.

expendables.description: Lumber, rigging hardware, sandbags, rope, and other consumables.

recordingPackage.description: 3x Digital multitrack recording packages with full complement of Schoeps, Sennheiser mics for 17 shooting weeks.

specialRecording.description: Rental of hydrophones for underwater work, specialized plant mics for suit audio, and extensive wireless systems for vehicle sequences.

communications.description: 120-user wireless intercom system with multi-zone capability for all production phases.

expendables.description: All batteries, media cards, connectors, and mounting accessories.

mechanicalEffects.description: Design, engineering, fabrication, and safety certification for large-scale practical effects including a full-size Royal Talon Fighter motion-base cockpit, a functional Vibranium Mine Train system, and waterfall/throne room mechanisms.

opticalEffects.description: Rental and operation of rigs for suit materialization, cloaking effects, and energy blasts. Includes pyrotechnics and safety systems.

editingRooms.description: 6x Avid Media Composer suites with shared storage, rented for a 40-week post-production schedule.

soundMixing.description: Rental of a certified Dolby Atmos 7.1 mixing stage for 10 weeks.

opticalWork.description: Rental of an advanced HDR color grading suite (8 weeks), access to render farm, and petabyte-scale raw data storage systems.

equipmentTrucks.description: Fleet of 12 dedicated equipment trucks (5-ton and 10-ton) for all US-based shooting.

specialTransport.description: Includes cost for 12x 40ft shipping containers (sea freight to Busan and Cape Town), professional customs brokerage, ATA Carnets, and a contingency for air freight.
